tutorialPages.messageText: NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "9633D4074683DEF3512805A30AE3634F", "Crafting stations are used to turn processed goods into finished items. Each of the 8 crafting professions has its own stations and recipe lists.")

NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "07F1B7154A8EE1AE94ADF3A492A8DA30", "What you can craft is determined by your level in a given Profession. You can level up your skill in a profession by successfully creating items.")
NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "F23BD67B4D0C21B9B545B78750F65708", "As you improve your profession level, advanced stations and stronger recipes will become available to you!")
